casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Torrey GRADY 179A14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 18, 2018 Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Luke M. Everett, Attorney at Law, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Grady, Torrey Dale. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of July 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of July 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 17th day of August 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
